

#### Solution

```{r, echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
  mns_A = matrix(with(dat,tapply(Data, FactorA, mean)),nrow=1)
  colnames(mns_A) = paste('a',1:2)
  rownames(mns_A) = "Marginal Means Factor A: "
  
  knitr::kable(mns_A, digits = 2, format = "html", table.attr = "class=\"anovatab2\"")
  
```  
  
```{r, echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
  
  sds_A = matrix(with(dat,tapply(Data, FactorA, sd)),nrow=1)

  rownames(sds_A) = "Marginal  SDs Factor A: "
  
  knitr::kable(sds_A, digits = 2, format = "html", table.attr = "class=\"anovatab2\"")

```
